tooltips.csvUrl: URL of a publicly accessible CSV file. For Google Sheets, publish as CSV: File → Share → Publish to web → CSV format. Example: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/{ID}/export?format=csv
tooltips.fieldMapping: JSON object mapping CSV column names to Lead fields. Example: {"first_name": "firstName", "email": "emailAddress"}
tooltips.defaultFieldMapping: If enabled, common column names (firstName, email, phone, etc.) will be automatically mapped to Lead fields.
tooltips.skipDuplicates: If enabled, leads with matching email/phone will not be created.

messages.Are you sure you want to run the import: Are you sure you want to run the import now?
messages.Are you sure you want to reset the count: Are you sure you want to reset the counter? This will re-import all rows from the beginning.
